titleStmt.title: Diego redivivus: or The last will and testament of the pretended Humphrey Wickham, Esq; alias William Morrel, alias Bowyer, &c. With a full relation of his notorious cheats and impostures: who dyed at Mr Cullins house, the third of ths instant January, in the parish of St. Clement Danes, &c. Licensed and entred in the register-book of the Company of Stationers.

Diego redivivus: or The last will and testament of the pretended Humphrey Wickham, Esq; alias William Morrel, alias Bowyer, &c. With a full relation of his notorious cheats and impostures: who dyed at Mr Cullins house, the third of ths instant January, in the parish of St. Clement Danes, &c. Licensed and entred in the register-book of the Company of Stationers.
titleStmt.author: Morrell, William, d. 1692?. aut

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Abel Roper, at the Mitre near Temple-Bar,

notesStmt.note: Identified on UMI microfilm (Early English books, 1641-1700) reel 1765 as Wing (2nd ed.) M2807A.
Reproductions of the originals in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery and the Bodleian Library.
